ARABIC: رَبَّنَآ أَخْرِجْنَا مِنْهَا فَإِنْ عُدْنَا فَإِنَّا ظَٰلِمُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Our Lord, remove us from it! Then if we revert again, we will definitely be wrongdoers.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Get us out of this, O Lord. If we transgress we will surely be sinful."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Our Lord! Take us out of this. Then if we revert (to evil-doing) we shall indeed be wrongdoers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Lord, take us out of this and if we sin again, we shall certainly be unjust".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Our Lord, remove us from hell – then if we do the same, we are the unjust.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Our Lord! Bring us out of this. If ever we return (to evil), then indeed we shall be wrongdoers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: O our Lord! Take us out of it; then if we return (to evil) surely we shall be unjust.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Our Lord, bring us forth out of it! Then, if we revert, we shall be evildoers indeed.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Our Lord! Oh, bring us forth from hence! If we return (to evil) then indeed we shall be wrong-doers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Lord, deliver us from Hell. Then, if we revert again, we shall definitely be wrongdoers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: O our Lord! take us forth from it: then if we return, we shall be wrong-doers indeed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Our Lord! Bring us out of this! Then, if we revert [to our previous conduct], we will indeed be wrongdoers.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Our Lord! bring us out of this: if ever we return (to Evil), then shall we be wrong-doers indeed!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Our Lord! Bring us out of this; if ever we return (to evil), then indeed we shall be Zalimun: (polytheists, oppressors, unjust, and wrong-doers, etc.)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Our Lord, bring us out of it. If we return (to sin), then we shall indeed be harmdoers'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Our Lord! Bring us out of this. If we ever returned, we would truly be evil.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Our Lord, remove us from it, and if we were to return [to evil], we would indeed be wrongdoers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:107] Our Lord, bring us out of it! Then, if we revert, to disobedience, we will indeed be evildoers’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Our Lord!) O our Lord! (Oh, bring us forth from hence) take us out of hell! (If we return) to disbelief (then indeed we shall be wrong-doers) then we will be transgressing against ourselves.
